File_format

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • File_format.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a map and have the ability to convert image map from pixel to gps coordinate and back to gps This class also have methods for calculate distance and the azimuth between 2 point in pixel
    Author:
    Carmel, Netanel In this class we use this code : https://stackoverflow.com/questions/38748832/convert-longitude-and-latitude-coordinates-to-image-of-a-map-pixels-x-and-y-coor
